examples: I'll have a cold beer, please.
We had a few beers and watched the game.
I brewed my own beer last weekend.
Eu vou querer uma cerveja gelada, por favor.
Tomamos algumas cervejas e assistimos ao jogo.

suggested: Why is beer better than women? You can have more than one without being a pig.
Beer is like liquid bread, but when you drink too much of it you end up feeling worse than when you're hungry.
Why is it so hard to find a good beer these days? Everything tastes like watered-down horse piss.
Did you know that beer was once used as currency in ancient Egypt?
The aroma of a freshly poured beer.
The feeling of a cold beer bottle in your hand on a hot day.
The social connection and bonding that comes with sharing a beer with friends.
